title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, embed, pull models via Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chat history, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools for Ollama models (JSON mode).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop client for Ollama; cross-platform, ships binaries for macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines using Ollama embeddings + LangChain + Chroma.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor; generate, refactor, explain code.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama with TailwindCSS; deploy to Vercel in one click.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama commands to summarize notes, brainstorm, or continue writing.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server (Go) that bridges Slack threads to Ollama models with mention triggers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper for Ollama with prompts library, output templating, and batch inference.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for quantized Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API; tokio/hyper based.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.
